oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comparison of Dairy Cow Behavior in Sand and Mattress Freestall Barns in Relation to Lameness
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cook, N. B.
Bennett, T. B.
Nordlund, K. V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cow behavior
freestalls
bedding
deep sand
rubber crumb
lameness
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of the study was to identify behavioral differences between cows housed in freestalls bedded with deep sand and cows housed in freestalls with rubber crumb mattresses, which may explain differences in lameness prevalence observed between the two types of farm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2004; 194
